incremental.title: Incremental loading
incremental.description: Check if you want to use incremental loading of data into Keboola storage.

extraction_target.title: Extraction target
extraction_target.description: What kind of data do you want to extract.

time_range.title: Time range
time_range.description: Time range can either be unspecified (null), then all time statistics will be downloaded, otherwise it determines the time range of the data.

oneOf.title: Unspecified time range
oneOf.description: All time statistics will be downloaded.

oneOf.title: Specified time range
oneOf.description: Statistics for each day contained in the time range will be downloaded. As for granularity, daily (delimited by UTC midnight) is always used.

start.title: Start
start.description: Start of the time range. Can either be a specific datetime or relative expression such as '7 days ago', '1 year ago', etc.

end.title: End
end.description: End of the time range. Can either be a specific datetime or relative expression such as 'now', '1 day ago', etc.
